About me

I'm Brice, a French junior web developer in retraining. After exploring another field for several years, I decided to follow my true passion: web development. Since then, I’ve been diving deep into this universe and I enjoy learning, building and solving complex problems.

Recently graduated from a certification training at O'clock, where I followed an intensive course in web development, I acquired a solid foundation that allows me to quickly adapt to different projects and environments. Always looking for new opportunities and cool projects, don’t hesitate to contact me to discuss or collaborate !
